ctx: intros f Hf l x H.
induction l as [| a l IHl].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet --: Current bullet -- is not finished.

ctx: intros f Hf l x H.
induction l as [| a l IHl].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type RA : relation A RB : relation B f : A -> B -> A Hf : Proper (RA ==> RB ==> RA) f a : B l, x : list B H : Forall2 RB (a :: l) x IHl : Forall2 RB l x -> (RA ==> RA)%signature (fold_left f l) (fold_left f x) Unable to unify "(RA ==> RA)%signature (fold_left f l) (fold_left f x)" with "(RA ==> RA)%signature (fun a0 : A => fold_left f l (f a0 a)) (fold_left f x)".

ctx: intros f Hf l x H.
induction l as [| a l IHl].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type RA : relation A RB : relation B f : A -> B -> A Hf : Proper (RA ==> RB ==> RA) f a : B l : list B y : B l' : list B IHl : Forall2 RB l (y :: l') -> (RA ==> RA)%signature (fold_left f l) (fun a0 : A => fold_left f l' (f a0 y)) H2 : RB a y H4 : Forall2 RB l l' Unable to unify "Proper (RA ==> RB ==> RA) f" with "(RA ==> RA)%signature (fun a0 : A => fold_left f l (f a0 a)) (fun a0 : A => fold_left f l' (f a0 y))".

original: intros f Hf l x H. induction l as [| a l IHl]. -- simpl. unfold Proper. intros x0 Hx0. auto. -- simpl. apply IHl. apply Hf; auto.
